response.original_title: AVショップで明日花キララの人気度チェック 一般ユーザー突撃インタビュー！悪口言ったら背後から本人登場！キララのプロ技でヌキまくり好感度アップ大作戦！
response.overview: The guy with the voice in off who handles the camera is “Take-d”, who is also the director for this movie. He also directed Asuka Kirara before on SNIS-651, which was referenced in this movie at some point too. She brings Asuka Kirara to a “real” Adult video store. And the plan is for him to interview random fans and to discover what they really think about Asuka Kirara, like a popularity check. Asuka Kirara will be hiding in the shop and listening to what the fans say live.  That is basically the recipe for all the happenings on the movie, as Kirara ends up surprise talking directly with those fans which were absolutely hilarious. For the most part, Kirara gets roasted, but it was all in good fun.
response.title: We’re Making A Popularity Ranking Check On Kirara Asuka At The AV Shop Surprise Interviews With Our Members Of The Public! If They Give Her Hate, She Shows Up From Behind! Kirara Will Attempt To Raise Her Ratings With Her Amazing Nookie Technique!
